name: Initial Movement
description: Each buyer will be sent a second piece.   There has always been someone to breathe life into the display hardware hardware I designed. These images are part of my search for that moment of emotional resonance. The hardware has been abstracted by optics salvaged from a different type of display. A reminder that a lot of my hardware development has depended on hybridization. The goal is to physically capture the ephemeral nature of light.
